articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: iFixit's Apple Watch Series 7 teardown shows the same display tech as iPhone 13
articles.description: iFixit has taken apart the Apple Watch Series 7 and showed that despite having minimal changes on the outside, it does feature some big upgrades underneath. As we mentioned in our review, the main difference between this device and the Series 6 is its slightl…
